alert.note: Alert for Wind River Mountains East; Wind River Mountains West (Wyoming) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Storm Warning issued March 14 at 1:31PM MDT until March 16 at 12:00PM MDT by NWS Riverton
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 6 PM THIS EVENING TO NOON MDT THURSDAY... * WHAT...Heavy snow expected. Total snow accumulations of 8 to 16 inches, with lower amounts of 4 to 8 inches around South Pass. Winds could gust as high as 40 to 50 mph, with higher gusts around Red Canyon. * WHERE...Wind River Mountains West and Wind River Mountains East. * WHEN...From 6 PM this evening to noon MDT Thursday. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult over South Pass. Patchy blowing snow could significantly reduce visibility.
info.instruction: If you must travel, keep an extra flashlight, food, and water in your vehicle in case of an emergency. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.

area.areaDesc: Wind River Mountains East; Wind River Mountains West
